import React from "react" import "./repository.css" import { repositoryCard } from "../../dummydata" const RepositoryCard = () => { return ( <>
{coursesCard.map((val) => (

{val.coursesName}

{val.courTeacher.map((details) => ( <>

{details.name}

{details.totalTime} ))}

{val.priceAll} / {val.pricePer}

))}
) } export default RepositoryCard
